Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Specimen Container(s): Xpert Nasopharyngeal Sample Collection Kit tube (plastic medical-grade polypropylene)
Xpert Nasal Sample Collection Kit tube (plastic medical-grade polypropylene)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Multiplex real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert Xpress Flu/RSV assay and sample collection kits using automated multiplex real-time RT-PCR for qualitative detection of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV from nasopharyngeal and nasal swab specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV viral RNA from nasopharyngeal and nasal swab specimens in patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, as an aid in the diagnosis of influenza and RSV infections in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors.
